title: @file and @folder inline references in chat input
description: Claude Code, aider, Gemini all support @file:path to inject file contents into the prompt. Ion only has @image: support. Expand to @file: and @folder: with autocomplete.

logs.msg: Research complete: ai/research/file-refs-2026.md covers 6 tools (Claude Code, Cursor, Aider, Gemini CLI, Continue.dev, Zed), PDF crate comparison (pdf-extract recommended), document conversion strategies, large file handling patterns, and recommended implementation for ion
